# Memorose Brand Assets

This directory contains Memorose logo files in various resolutions.

## Logo Files

| File | Size | Resolution | Usage |
|------|------|------------|-------|
| `logo-256.png` | 44K | 256×256 | Small icons, favicons |
| `logo-512.png` | 119K | 512×512 | Social media, thumbnails |
| `logo.png` | 119K | - | Main logo (README) |
| `logo-1024.png` | 318K | 1024×1024 | High-res displays |
| `logo-2048.png` | 818K | 2048×2048 | Print materials |
| `logo-4096.png` | 2.1M | 4096×4096 | High-quality print |

## Usage

```markdown
<!-- In README.md -->
![Memorose Logo](.github/assets/logo.png)
```

## License

These assets are part of the Memorose project and follow the same Apache 2.0 license.
